name: Sagittarius (atakanvardar)
description:
Sagittarius is a multiplayer top-down shooter game based on a Minecraft multiplayer mode called "One in the Quiver".

Basically, every player starts with 3 arrows and everyone can be killed by one arrow shot or 3 melee attacks. Players have the ability to dash wherever they please, but the dash skill has a cooldown. 

Whenever a player kills someone, he/she gain one arrow, but the maximum arrow count that can be carried is 3.

If a player misses his shot, the arrow will be stuck on the floor or on the walls, these arrows can be retaken by the owner later.

Controls

W, A ,S ,D to move.

Mouse to aim

Pressing Left-click - draw bow.

Releasing Left-click - shoot.

Right-click - melee.

Space - Dash

Team

Atakan Vardar - Lead Developer

Cag Can Cakli - Animations, rigging, and level design.

Enes Saatci - UI & VFX design.

Emre Ciftci - Sound design.

This project was a prototype for our Multiplayer game design class, so you might find some bugs within the game.

-Customization feature is not available on this version.-
